page.title: 08Farms in our Area
page.content:
There are nineteen farms in our area. Three of the farms are unusual.At{Dove {Cote farm}there are fifty horses, a riding school and horses are bred there .At{Field House farm}there are 2880 pigs and at{Claypit farm}there are many thousands of chickens which are kept in large sheds.
We checked seven farms in our area.The acreage of several farms was, 92 acres,170 acres,100 acres,150 acres, 124 acres and 240 acres. This averages to 125 acres for each farm. Most of the farms checked were mixed but some were only for animals and had no crops.Of the farms surveyed one farm had 300 cattle and 3 horses. Another had 50 cattle,50 horses and 20 poultry another had a 100 cattle. Another 190 cattle and others had 85 cattle and 10 cattle.
